summary: Decades-old found footage from NASA's abandoned Apollo 18 mission, where three American astronauts were sent on a secret expedition, reveals the reason the U.S. has never returned to the moon.
cast: Warren Christie|Lloyd Owen|Ryan Robbins|Michael Kopsa|Andrew Airlie|Kurt Max Runte|Jan Bos|Kim Wylie|Noah Wylie|Ali Liebert|Erica Carroll|Thomas Greenwood|John F. Kennedy
title: Apollo 18
